name: @gnosis.pm/gno-token
description: The GNO token and related smart contracts

scripts.rpc: ganache-cli -d --mnemonic 'candy maple cake sugar pudding cream honey rich smooth crumble sweet treat' --defaultBalanceEther '500'
scripts.networks-reset: mkdir -p build/contracts && truffle networks --clean && npm run networks-inject
scripts.compile: eslint --fix . && eslint . && truffle compile && npm run compile-legacy
scripts.restore: npm run compile && npm run networks-reset
scripts.migrate-all: npm run migrate-dep && npm run migrate
